title: My Ranked Match History

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: Well, this is very saddening, out of 18 Ranked games I've won 2

replies.body: It looks like your fault mostly. In that riven game why did you only have 14 CS at 33 minutes?
My Client Dced and my PC is slow and it took me 20minutes to reconnect and then my game crashed. I'm in a big tilt.

If your PC is slow *Or just bad* don't play rank.
Because 4 people now have to suffer because you couldn't connect.
Save up for a proper PC.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Kc5dKKgu,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-24T02:18:42.979+0000)
>
> If your PC is slow *Or just bad* don't play rank.
> Because 4 people now have to suffer because you couldn't connect.
> Save up for a proper PC.

I use a macbook air  lolol

I have a two grand gaming PC, however my graphics card broke, leaving me using my 2Gb motherboard one and 4 weeks ago one of ram cards failed, leaving me with 8gb of ram and 2gb of graphics, they are still out on warranty. Waiting for them to come back.

I know the feeling some of my shit broke too.
Looks like your just gonna have to wait.
